title: Castle Hotels in Italy
text:
Expert Videos 
Staying in an Italian castle hotel can be very romantic. Here are renovated castles in Italy where you can spend the night and feel like a king or queen. Some also have restaurants so if you don't want to spend the night, you could just visit for a meal. Castello di Valenzano. ©2012 Betsy Malloy Photography. Used by Permission • Castello Valenzano - Tuscany near Arezzo 
Stay in a castle dating back to the ninth or tenth century at Castello Valenzano. Perched on a hill overlooking the Arno River Valley near a national park, the castle is about half an hour north of Arezzo. There are nine rooms, a garden, and a restaurant at the hotel. More » • Castello del Nero - Chianti Wine Region of Tuscany 
Castello del Nero is a small 5-star boutique hotel and spa in the Chianti region of Tuscany. The hotel has a swimming pool, spa, tennis courts, garden, vineyard views, bar, and 2 restaurants. It's a member of Leading Small Hotels of the World. They can also do weddings and events. Note that seasonal closing is usually from mid-January until beginning of April.
